contentencoded:
From the Marketplace Datebook, here’s a look at what's coming up Thursday:

  • In Washington, a Senate Committee discusses "Promoting College Access and Success For Students With Disabilities."
  • The Commerce Department reports on durable goods for January. Maybe you got yourself an appliance?
  • A House subcommittee on Highways and Transit holds a hearing on "Improving the Nation’s Highway Freight Network."
  • Academy Award-winning screen beauty and AIDS activist Elizabeth Taylor was born on February 27, 1932.
  • Feeling a little cold? Winter getting you down? Well, bring on the heat. Tomorrow is National Chili Day.
title: Chill out for National Chili Day
